comments.author: digaran
comments.body: A white paper for a project should be written by the main developer, any white paper written by someone else is not to be trusted.P.s, the red glow you have used is back firing, not that it matters.

comments.author: CryptoGM
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on March 16, 2023, 06:42:30 PMA white paper for a project should be written by the main developer, any white paper written by someone else is not to be trusted.P.s, the red glow you have used is back firing, not that it matters. There is a difference between a copywriter and those who are out here plagiarised content. It matters to developers who need to focus on other aspects of the project.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: I expect to see loads of your ads on socials considering how much experience you have in the space (speaking from a standpoint of your porfolio).There are also other platforms that requires the professionalism of your work and more. It is always a job on platforms like Upwork, there are job openings from employers and projects that use these freelancing platforms and I believe your portfolio will get you something real quick if you consider extending your application in that direction.

comments.author: CryptoGM
comments.body: Quote from: wallet4bitcoin on December 16, 2023, 09:52:53 PMI expect to see loads of your ads on socials considering how much experience you have in the space (speaking from a standpoint of your porfolio).There are also other platforms that requires the professionalism of your work and more. It is always a job on platforms like Upwork, there are job openings from employers and projects that use these freelancing platforms and I believe your portfolio will get you something real quick if you consider extending your application in that direction.Thank you for the advise. Please share these platforms and social media where you encounter projects/employers who may need my service. In the past I have used Upwork and Fiverr but their recent terms and collaborating with my government to take part of my pay in tax made me leave such platforms. Freedom is key that's why I chose to work in the Bitcoin space full-time lol. Appreciated!
